results.title: Metformin therapy to reduce weight gain and visceral adiposity in children and adolescents with neurogenic or myogenic motor deficit.
results.text_hl: Results were similar across diagnostic subgroups. In conclusion, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment for 6 months was associated with a rise in @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ sensitivity and with a reduction of @DISEASE_Intestinal_Pseudo_Obstruction @DISEASE_MESH:D007418 @@@visceral adiposity@@@ in children and adolescents with a primary @DISEASE_Muscular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D009135 @@@muscle disorder@@@ or with a @<m>DISEASE_Neural_Tube_Defects</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009436 @@@neural tube defect@@@.
